member.name: M:JamSoft.Helpers.Crypto.CryptoFactory.Create(System.String,System.String)
member.summary:
Creates an instance of using the provided keys.
You can provide both keys or just the private key for signing, or just the public key for verification
Defaults to using and with a 2048-bit key
The keys can be extracted in xml format from the and properties
member.exception: thrown when both the public key and private keys a null or empty
